text: Varol Salman Tasar (; born 4 October 1996) is a German professional footballer who plays as a forward for the Swiss club Servette. ==Professional career== After successful season with FC Aarau in the Swiss Challenge League, Tasar signed a precontract with Servette FC on 13 February 2019. ==Personal life== Born in Germany, Tasar is of Turkish descent. ==References== ==External links== * * Kicker Profile Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Waldshut-Tiengen Category:German footballers Category:German people of Turkish descent Category:Servette FC players Category:FC Aarau players Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Swiss Challenge League players Category:Association football forwards Category:German expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Switzerland
title: Varol Tasar
